#  Data Visualization or EDA
 
In this notebook I will walk you through data visualization on the Titanic dataset.

**I know you have been gone through some similar notebooks based on Data Visualization, and some would have find them difficult to understand because of codes were little bit harder. In this notebook I have visualized the data that is easy to understand** So lets start. 

**Data visualization** is the graphical representation of information and data. By using visual elements like charts, graphs, and maps, data visualization tools provide an accessible way to see and understand trends, outliers, and patterns in data.
We will be using the Seaborn Library.

So let'start by importing some libaries.
